item.title: [WIP] Deploying Object Detection Models on Mobile Devices with Flutter for Busy Engineers
item.description: Deployment - where most models fail According to Gartner, more than 85% of machine learning models never made it into production. This trend is expected to continue further this year in 2022. Despite huge efforts in research, machine learning models often fail in the deployment. What exactly is deployment? In simple terms, deployment means making a model’s capability or insight available to users or other systems - Luigi Patruno. Only when a model is deployed can they add value to businesses or organizations
